channel.title: Isles of Gielinor | A brand new journey!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LFxeNKS.png[/img] [COLOR=red] Update: 1.0[/COLOR]
Project Team:
Anval Brandon [/CENTER]
What is the Isles of Gielinor?
[i]The Isles of Gielinor is a private server based exclusively on the islands in the land of RuneScape, and an old project of mine that I never really got around to finishing. Now that I have Brandon on the team, it is going to be easier to get content finished. Our main goal is to achieve and complete a game in which all the islands are access able and filled with many features and NPC's. Also to where players can interact with all the objects in the atmosphere. This basically means every main object in the game has some sort of function. Basically to where you can chat with every global NPC, have several accomplish able quests including a main storyline, fight many bosses and creatures, perfect drop tables and loots, object and game interactions, several skills to train and master, and most importantly, many multiplayer features to make the game enjoyable for the players.[/i]
Storyline: [i] You wake up in the far north-east wing of Shilo Village, you have no idea who you are or where you are. You see a village faintly in the horizon. You are terribly injured and don't know it had happened. You decide to stand up and ask people for help, if there are any. Throughout your journey on this island you discover a whole bunch of tribe members who will provide you with assistance, but for a price that is. You must accomplish quests and missions to seek who you really are and why you are in such a strange jungle.[/i]
[CENTER]Skilling Key:
[COLOR=green]Completed[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Incomplete[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Not Started[/COLOR]
Extra:
[COLOR=green]Melee Combat[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Ranged Combat[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Magic Combat (including spells)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Clan Chat[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Private Messaging[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Option Saving[/COLOR]
Skilling:
[COLOR=red]Agility[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Construction[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Cooking[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Dungeoneering[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Farming[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Firemaking[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Fishing[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Fletching[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Herblore[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Hunter[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Mining[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Prayer[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Slayer[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Smithing[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Summoning[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Thieving[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Woodcutting[/COLOR]
Minigames:
[COLOR=green]Barrows[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Clan Wars[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Duel Arena[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]God Wars[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Pest Control[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Soul Wars[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Warriors Guild[/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[RIGHT]Credits: Relex Lawl [/RIGHT]

item.title: Isles of Gielinor | A brand new journey!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Anval, post:21, topic:529529”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=648283.msg4361974#msg4361974 date=1378934670]
The Wise Old Man part kinda. What person would be carrying an axe, shrimp, and stuff like that? Make it more original! Make the old man hand him multiple tasks. Each task will reward each item you had in that starter.

Ex: Help Fishkeeper
Reward: Those fish you had in the starter.

Help Lumberjack
Reward: Axe
[/quote]

Oh, dude. I’m surprised I didn’t think of that. It’s alright though, I just though of this all to get things started. I will do so once I get a few things done. I also added several global items, like in the black smith area, on a crate there is a hammer. (etc).

EDIT: If you want to write the story line, I would be honored. I need people giving me suggestions like this. :)[/quote]
I could if you wanted. Maybe in the weekends? I’m far too busy in the weekdays.

Read full topic

Oh, dude. I’m surprised I didn’t think of that. It’s alright though, I just though of this all to get things started. I will do so once I get a few things done. I also added several global items, like in the black smith area, on a crate there is a hammer. (etc).

Anval
Brandon

What is the Isles of Gielinor?

The Isles of Gielinor is a private server based exclusively on the islands in the land of RuneScape, and an old project of mine that I never really got around to finishing. Also to where players can interact with all the objects in the atmosphere. This basically means every main object in the game has some sort of function. Storyline:

You wake up in the far north-east wing of Shilo Village, you have no idea who you are or where you are. You see a village faintly in the horizon. You are terribly injured and don’t know it had happened. You decide to stand up and ask people for help, if there are any. Throughout your journey on this island you discover a whole bunch of tribe members who will provide you with assistance, but for a price that is. You must accomplish quests and missions to seek who you really are and why you are in such a strange jungle.
